name: Bay of Drowned Wishes

champions.name: Overload
champions.desc: One spawns outside the barrier; two spawn in the boss room.

champions.name: Unstoppable
champions.desc: Last champion spawns when you get closer to the cave barrier. Each spawn is accompanied by many Screebs.

shields.name: Void
shields.desc: One Scorn Raider on a far away platform.

modifiers.name: Raider Shield
modifiers.desc: Scorn Raiders now have Void shields.

notes: Lots of Screebs. Boss room ads seem to spawn infinitely. Ads will jump up onto the platform where you enter.

name: Chamber of Starlight

champions.name: Overload
champions.desc: One in the first section, one on the far away platform and can be sniped at, and one in the final wave on that same platform.

champions.name: Unstoppable
champions.desc: One in the first section, one in the next; three spawn together in the final wave.

shields.name: Void
shields.desc: Taken Acolytes all have Void shields. Wizard Boss has Void shield.

modifiers.name: Epitaph
modifiers.desc: Taken combatants generate blight geysers when defeated.

modifiers.name: Attrition
modifiers.desc: Regeneration is greatly impaired. Defeating enemies may create wells of Light.

notes: Lots of Taken Acolytes and Thrall.

name: Aphelion’s Rest

champions.name: Overload
champions.desc: Appear on far away platforms, and often move behind cover.

burnDesc: Taken Acolytes and Boss have Stasis weapons that slow and freeze you.

shields.name: Void
shields.desc: Taken Acolytes all have Void shields.

modifiers.name: Epitaph
modifiers.desc: Taken combatants generate blight geysers when defeated.

notes: Taken Psions duplicate frequently and quickly. Lots of Stasis AOE damage in the boss area.

name: The Empty Tank

champions.name: Overload
champions.desc: Fallen Captains. One in LS entrance before the first room; second one when you enter the first room, by the DJ console; third comes through the door when you activate the console; fourth spawns in boss room from the left door, after you kill the initial enemies.

champions.name: Barrier
champions.desc: 3 Barrier Servitors that shield lots of ads; 2 of them spawn together in the boss room. 2 Barrier Colossuses in the boss room.

shields.name: Arc
shields.desc: Fallen Captains, when you first enter the boss room.

modifiers.name: Arach-NO!
modifiers.desc: When defeated, Fallen Vandals spawn a web mine at their feet.

notes: In the spooky hallway between the first and boss rooms, there are Thrall and Cabal dogs. The boss frequently turns invisible.

name: K1 Logistics

champions.name: Overload
champions.desc: Fallen Captains. One spawns in the boss area.

champions.name: Barrier
champions.desc: Barrier Servitors. Two spawn in the boss area.

shields.name: Arc
shields.desc: Fallen Captains have Arc shields. There's one in the first area and a few in the boss area.

notes: Servitor boss teleports twice at each 3rd of its health, starting from middle → left → right.

name: K1 Communion

champions.name: Overload
champions.desc: Fallen captains.

champions.name: Barrier
champions.desc: Barrier Servitors. Final Barrier Servitor doesn't spawn in the boss room if you kill the boss fast enough.

modifiers.name: Arach-NO!
modifiers.desc: When defeated, Fallen Vandals spawn a web mine at their feet.

notes: Boss appears after you kill the ads and Heavy Shank. You can prevent the third Barrier Servitor and a wave of Exploder Shanks from spawning if you kill the boss fast enough.

champions.name: Overload
champions.desc: Fallen Captains.

champions.name: Barrier
champions.desc: Barrier Servitors. Last Barrier Servitor spawns when the boss is at 50% health.

name: K1 Revelation

champions.name: Unstoppable
champions.desc: Ogres that spawn at the three crystals.

champions.name: Barrier
champions.desc: Knights. Two will spawn alongside the boss.

shields.name: Arc
shields.desc: Arc knight after you kill the boss.

modifiers.name: Fire Pit
modifiers.desc: When defeated, Acolytes spawn fire pools that cause damage over time.

notes: There's one Shrieker in the distance. Destroy the floating crystals to advance to the boss fight. Many ads still spawn after you defeat the boss, so getting to the chest without killing them is challenging.

name: Concealed Void

champions.name: Overload
champions.desc: Fallen Captains. The third Overload Champion is bugged, and doesn't stay stunned.

champions.name: Barrier
champions.desc: Barrier Servitor that shields enemies. It frequently teleports behind cover.

shields.name: Void
shields.desc: Void Servitor in the boss room that shields enemies. You can get away with ignoring it and focusing only on the boss. It seems that if you kill the first one, another will spawn in a later wave.

modifiers.name: Arach-NO!
modifiers.desc: When defeated, Fallen Vandals spawn a web mine at their feet.

notes: There's a wave of Exploder Shanks when you jump across the gap before the boss room. The boss is a Fallen Captain that teleports around.

name: Bunker E15

champions.name: Overload
champions.desc: Overload Captain in the beginning. Two Overload Minotaurs in the boss room, though the second one sometimes doesn't spawn if you defeat the boss quickly enough.

champions.name: Barrier
champions.desc: Two Barrier Hobgoblins in the Cyclops room.

modifiers.name: Shocker
modifiers.desc: When defeated, Goblins spawn Arc pools that cause damage over time.

notes: Cyclops in the big room. One Wyvern in the boss room. Boss is a Hydra that slowly teleports around.

name: Perdition

champions.name: Overload
champions.desc: Overload Minotaurs.

champions.name: Barrier
champions.desc: Barrier Hobgoblins.

modifiers.name: Shocker
modifiers.desc: When defeated, Goblins spawn Arc pools that cause damage over time.

notes: Two Wyverns in the second room. Mini Hydra spawns in first room and keeps teleporting back; it's helpful to kill it sooner rather than later. Boss can be melted with a super as soon as it spawns.
